1.0.0.en: Initial release of Wasp in a Box - Virtual presence detection system

1.0.1.en: Removed Homey Cloud platform support (Homey Pro only)

1.0.2.en: Added GitHub support URLs for issue tracking and public support

1.1.0.en: New Device: Room State Manager for zone-based state tracking with state hierarchies and timer-based transitions. Occupancy Device Improvements: Event-driven sensor monitoring (replacing polling), room type templates for quick setup, stale sensor detection, and UI improvements.

1.2.0.en: Added Zone Seal Monitor driver that aggregates door/window sensors to detect when zones are sealed or leaky, enabling automated heating control based on room seal status. Room State Manager improved with pulsing occupancy indicator.

1.2.1.en: Improved device reliability with automatic error recovery and self-healing capabilities. Devices now provide clearer warning messages when issues occur and continue functioning even with partial failures.

1.2.2.en: Room State Manager pairing flow simplified: now select an existing WIAB occupancy device instead of configuring individual sensors. Room State Manager monitors WIAB device occupancy changes with configurable timer-based state transitions.
